Warning

Always make sure you are navigating on the real Premium Cards website by checking the onion address : hbl6udan73w7qbjdey6chsu5gq5ehrfqbb73jq726kj3khnev2yarlid.onion. There are a few clones of our website having similar names and design.

HOW IT WORKS

The ,,Premium Cards'' business was founded by a group of professional carders who wanted to deliver a product which is 100% SAFE to use by anyone regardless of whether you are a first-time customer or a seasoned ,,professional card casher'' like we like to call our loyal customers. We were among the first to develop what is called a Prepaid Debit card which is basically what it sounds, a pre-paid debit card pre-loaded with funds which have been cleaned multiple times to ensure that no one will ever know the source of the funds and protect our customers from any risk as opposed to a cloned card which are risk associated products because the previous owner can let the bank know something is wrong the first time you try to cashout. Our cards are a simple and stress-free method to increase your wealth.

In order to provide a truly complete service, to deliver quickly and shorten the delivery distance thus decreasing even more transit risks we are shipping from multiple locations from the US and Europe.

Proudly listed on the official Hidden Wiki

CHIP&MAGNETIC

All our cards are chipped and magnetic. Contactless is available by request.

PIN

PIN number is provided for each card and it is customizable at any ATM featuring this option.

UNTRACEABLE&UNBLOCKABLE

We use latest methods and technologies to provide maximum satisfaction and protection.

WARRANTY & REFUND

Each product comes with a 90 days warranty. You can choose between a new product or a full refund at any point you consider the card is not working as expected or advertised.

Another way of making sure our cards won't attract any unwanted attention while in transit is by printing them to look like a specific gift/prepaid card and by embossing a name, card numbers,etc on them. We can print almost any card design including regular bank cards and embosse any name you need. If you have no idea what design or name to choose, we can make that choice for you or we can leave it blank if that's what you want.

Click on the images below to see some examples of designs we can print. If none of those examples suit you, e-mail us a picture of the design you wish and we will make it happen.

AMEX

VISA

MASTERCARD

What do we stand for

Security

Our products have ZERO risks due to our hard work and pioneering methonds of cleaning the funds loaded onto our cards.

Constant quality work

Our work never stops. We are a small team but your endorsement motivates us working non stop towards updating our products and methods and that reflects in the number of recurring customers and regular referrals.

Reliability

We have been here since 2012 which proves we leave no room for mistakes and no room for security concerns.

Customer satisfaction

Over 20.000 clients have been served. So far, there have been no reports of cards not working; for confirmation, see our feedback section.

Safe shipping

Our small yet dedicated department in continuously looking for the best techniques to safely deliver from our warehouse to your door or post office box and we haven't disappointed a single one of you.

Fair pricing

Our costs reflect our high quality and meticulous work.If product quality and security is what you are looking for then we are glad to take you onboard as a loyal customer.

OUR PRODUCTS

Years of work and experimenting different methods have finally delivered in 2012, so we can happily present a risk-free card. Currently we can offer you 6 different types of cards with 2 levels of balances each. Inspect and choose the best card that suits you.
No matter what card type you decide to purchase, the balance of the card will convert to your local currency at the ATM for a small fee from the bank that runs that specific ATM.

We are happy to add a new feature, we're now offering our customers the possibility to purchase a card and have it remotely re-loaded for the same cost saving you the trouble of waiting for a new physical card to arrive (the reloadable option costs 30 extra usd at the time you purchase a card).

Limited offer : Purchase 2 cards and get 1 bonus card, that’s 3 cards for the price of 2

If you leave a review, you'll receive a 10% discount on your next purchase.

OUR PRICES

Prices listed on this site are in USD. You will get an increasing price discount as the quantity of the cards purchased increases.

How to Order

1. Using our self-service checkout 

Choose the card type you want, then click the,,order now" button next to each card image and go through the checkout process.

2. Manual order by e-mail; for an example, see the image in Step 5.

Step 1

Examine our products and decide which is best for you: USD, EUR, GBP, AUD, CAD or Amex.

Order using our automated system for a fast and easy preocess.

If unsure about what you need, go to steps 2-5.

Step 2

Tell us how many cards you want to buy.

Step 3

Specify what kind of shipping you want (choose from bellow).

Step 4

Choose your payment method from our options.

Step 5

Send us an email to prepaiddebitpremium@protonmail.com with all this information. Use the image below as an example. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

Order email example

If there are any specifics on our website that we have overlooked and you have further questions, please send us an e-mail and we will respond as soon as we read it.

Shipping Options

REGULAR SHIPPING

Is included in the price of the cards. Takes 5-7 days and is available to any country.

EXPRESS SHIPPING

Will cost you extra $20. Will take 2-3 days to deliver and is available in most countries.

OVERNIGHT SHIPPING

Will cost you extra $30, but is available only to Mexico, USA and Canada.

* Tracking number is provided for all the shipping methods available.
You can safely use your own shipping details as over the years we have developed 100% safe shipping methods. Our packaging system is very well thought through and it won't seem suspicious for customs or the shipping company and even if it's opened there's nothing to incriminate you. Once you actually purchase we will give you more details about our methods of shipping securely and we can also e-mail you pictures of your package before it leaves our warehouse if that's what you want.

PAYMENT METHODS WE ACCEPT

These are the payment methods we accept at this moment.You can choose your favourite. Just tell us in your order email which it will be.

BITCOIN

Bitcoin is our favourite. It is the most popular and easy to get.

LITECOIN

Litecoin is largely known and easy to find.

ETHEREUM

Ethereum is everywhere nowadays.

MONERO

Monero is not easy to get but it is the best privacy you'll find online.

RIPPLE

Ripple is largely available and quite cheap.

STELLAR LUMENS

You may not have heard about it, but it's there and we accept it here.

WESTERN UNION

Fastest and globally available money transfer service.

TRANSFERWISE

We accept this payment method only in EURO option.

Even more cryptos available at checkout page

If you are having issues purchasing bitcoin or you are not sure how any of the payment methods work, send us an email and we might be able to help you out.

Thank You messages

Customers questions answered

Why should I choose you?

Take a good look at our website and analyze everything from reviews, text, prices and you'll realize experience is the ultimate fact that matters in this line of business and there isn't a more durable team out there than us.

What's the processing time for new orders?

Usually it doesn't take more than 6-12 hours to process a new order, however it can take up to 24 hours if there are many backorders.

How do I track my order's status?

Immediately after your purchase,our automated system will send an e-mail to the address provided by you in the ordering details with a unique order number assigned to your purchase.Simple paste that order number into ,,live tracking'' section on our website.

Can I use your card to purchase crypto?

Yep. You can safely use our cards to purchase crypto from online exchange/trading platforms.

What is the most used method to cashout?

Atm cash withdrawals and online usage (buying crypto or physical produces)

Do they work anywhere in the world?

Yes, even though we advise each customer to purchase a suitable card type by region (USD cards for USA, EURO cards for Europe,etc), it would not be an issue if you purchase a USD card and use it in New Zeeland.

Can I order using a gmail account?

You can use any e-mail provider but we would advise to use firstly use TOR browser when purchasing our products and secondly using a safe e-mail service such as : Protonmail, Mail2tor, Ctemplar etc.

Is there any extra hidden cost?

No, the prices shown on our website are final.

If your cards are so safe, why are you selling them?

Over the years we've understood that safety is what will keep us in business for a longer period than most of our competitors. Greedy people won't last long in this line of business. We do cashout ourselves a portion of what we produce, we have online and local loyal customers but the safest way we can make money and ,,get rid'' of production excess is to spread it all over the world, which means selling it to you. It's a win-win situation.
We also ,,hodl’’ part of the crypto we get from customers,so a part of the profit comes from long term holding.

Why are your prices a bit higher than in other places?

It's a simple answer. Because we DELIVER and not fail our customer.

I don't need the physical card, can I purchase the digital details of the card?

Yes, once you go through the automated ordering process on our website you will reach the ,,delivery method'' section where you will choose ,,digital delivery'' and we will e-mail you the full card details within 1 hour.

Since this is a pre-paid card, it means there is no previous owner correct?

That is correct.

Do you provide a cashout guide/manual?

All confirmed orders will receive a full PDF guide via e-mail with tips and tricks on the diverse ways to cashout perfectly under the radar.

How about the OTP code necessary for online spending?

We will provide you with a standard OTP code which will be valid for each online purchase you make.

How do I request a refund?

E-mail us stating the reasons for your request and if the reasons are valid we will refund you in no time.

Can I get one for free?

There are good deals and bad deals, but there’s no free deals, once you understand that, you can start making money by using our products.
